trans-unit.source: read function
trans-unit.target: read function

trans-unit.source: Invoked when a table is queried.
trans-unit.target: Invoked when a table is queried.

trans-unit.source: Parameters
trans-unit.target: Parameters

trans-unit.source: query
trans-unit.target: query

trans-unit.source: Type: <languageKeyword>object</languageKeyword>
trans-unit.target: Type: <languageKeyword>object</languageKeyword>

trans-unit.source: The <externalLink><linkText>Query object</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=260561</linkUri></externalLink> that represents a query against the table, with any filters, projections, or other predicates specified by the client already applied.
trans-unit.target: The <externalLink><linkText>Query object</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=260561</linkUri></externalLink> that represents a query against the table, with any filters, projections, or other predicates specified by the client already applied.

trans-unit.source: user
trans-unit.target: user

trans-unit.source: Type: <languageKeyword>object</languageKeyword>
trans-unit.target: Type: <languageKeyword>object</languageKeyword>

trans-unit.source: The <link xlink:href="71ea068c-d6ee-41f8-86fa-491621f1fac4" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">user object</link> that represents an authenticated user when authentication is required, otherwise <languageKeyword>undefined</languageKeyword>.
trans-unit.target: The <link xlink:href="71ea068c-d6ee-41f8-86fa-491621f1fac4" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">user object</link> that represents an authenticated user when authentication is required, otherwise <languageKeyword>undefined</languageKeyword>.

trans-unit.source: request
trans-unit.target: request

trans-unit.source: Type: <languageKeyword>object</languageKeyword>
trans-unit.target: Type: <languageKeyword>object</languageKeyword>

trans-unit.source: The <link xlink:href="6f77cfad-b160-447b-b170-c62e6987d819" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">request object</link> that represents the request for the operation.
trans-unit.target: The <link xlink:href="6f77cfad-b160-447b-b170-c62e6987d819" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">request object</link> that represents the request for the operation.

trans-unit.source: Return Value
trans-unit.target: Return Value

trans-unit.source: Type: <languageKeyword>undefined</languageKeyword>
trans-unit.target: Type: <languageKeyword>undefined</languageKeyword>

trans-unit.source: When the query operation succeeds, a response with 200 HTTP status code is returned along with the results of the query, or an empty body if no items are selected.
trans-unit.target: When the query operation succeeds, a response with 200 HTTP status code is returned along with the results of the query, or an empty body if no items are selected.

trans-unit.source: You can make additional changes to the behavior of the query in your script before to you call the <languageKeyword>execute</languageKeyword> method on the <link xlink:href="6f77cfad-b160-447b-b170-c62e6987d819" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">context object</link>.
trans-unit.target: You can make additional changes to the behavior of the query in your script before to you call the <languageKeyword>execute</languageKeyword> method on the <link xlink:href="6f77cfad-b160-447b-b170-c62e6987d819" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">context object</link>.

trans-unit.source: When the client does not specify the number of records to return, a default limit of 50 is set by the service.
trans-unit.target: When the client does not specify the number of records to return, a default limit of 50 is set by the service.

trans-unit.source: You can override the default success and error behaviors.
trans-unit.target: You can override the default success and error behaviors.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <link xlink:href="90f9c218-7b5b-497a-9495-38586a0b910f" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Mobile Services Extensibility Script Reference</link>
trans-unit.target: For more information, see <link xlink:href="90f9c218-7b5b-497a-9495-38586a0b910f" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Mobile Services Extensibility Script Reference</link>

trans-unit.source: How to: Authenticate with Windows Live
trans-unit.target: How to: Authenticate with Windows Live
